profile.name: Ananta Abdulla
profile.title: A Certified Data Analyst
profile.bio: I'm a Data Scientist who loves extracting insights from complex data to build impactful AI solutions. With experience in diverse industries, I'm committed to transforming data into actionable decisions. I thrive on continuous learning and applying innovative methods to deliver effective solutions.

about.description_p1: As a versatile data professional, I excel at cleaning, analyzing, and visualizing data to support strategic decision-making. My background in statistics and programming allows me to discover hidden patterns within large datasets.
about.description_p2: Beyond analysis, I specialize in developing Machine Learning models from concept to production. My passion for continuous learning keeps me updated with the latest trends, ensuring cutting-edge and efficient solutions.

experience.description: Engaged in real-world data projects, developed analytical dashboards, and assisted in data-driven decision-making processes.
Contributed to data cleaning scripts, generated insightful reports, and supported senior analysts in various data initiatives.

education.description: Graduated with a focus on Data Science and Business Analytics. Thesis on Predictive Modeling for Customer Behavior.
Completed pre-university education with emphasis on Computer Science and Mathematics.

projects.title: Optimization of Fuel Pump Maintenance
projects.description: Led data-driven optimization of fuel pump maintenance schedules, cutting costs by 20% and increasing efficiency. Tools: Python, Power BI, Advanced Excel.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis of Social Media
projects.description: Built a sentiment analysis pipeline to process large volumes of social media data, providing real-time insights into public opinion. (Python, NLTK, TensorFlow)

projects.title: Sales Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Designed interactive dashboard for retail sales forecasting, enabling better inventory management and sales strategy. Tools: Power BI, Tableau.

projects.title: Road Accident Analysis Project
projects.description: Analyzed road accident data to identify key factors and propose solutions for prevention. Tools: Python, Power BI.
